review: I like the concept but it gets 3 stars for the following reasons: It took nearly 2 months to arrive and I know it was a new (and much-hyped) product when I ordered but still, I expected better from a company the size of Google. I can't fault Amazon because they kept me informed every step of the way. Secondly, although it works well with Google sites like youtube and with the Netflix app, I would be more impressed if it worked with everything. By that I mean the Chromecast is locked into the Google Chrome browser so if it can't be watched in a browser window then it doesn't work. That may not be a problem for most people but if you have digital copies of movies that you want to watch then it just won't work.
